name: oilman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a man who owns or operates oil wells or who buys and sells oil: He started off his career as a Texas oilman.

NATURAL RESOURCES a man who owns an oil company, or who works in the industry that produces oil: Most oilmen expect oil prices to fall below $18 a barrel this year.
